request.description:
This endpoint sends an HTTP GET request to retrieve a list of blogs from the server. The response is in JSON format and includes an array of blog objects, each containing the following properties:

- "id": (number) The unique identifier for the blog.
    
- "user_id": (number) The identifier of the user who created the blog.
    
- "title": (string) The title of the blog.
    
- "content": (string) The content of the blog.
    
- "created_at": (string) The timestamp indicating when the blog was created.
    
- "updated_at": (string) The timestamp indicating when the blog was last updated.
